title: Windows 1
description:
This is the first version of Windows. 
What you need:

- 2 Spare Floppy Disks
- 1 Floppy Drive
- DOSBox (Optional)
==================================
======SYSTEM=REQUIREMENTS=========

256KB RAM

DOS 2.0

EGA Graphics Card

Don\\\&#039;t worry! Your PC should work with it.
